thread.title: Lindsay Lohan supports model brother Dakota Lohan at NYFW | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Lindsay Lohan supports model brother Dakota Lohan at NYFW | Daily Mail Online

author: Leeor Samocha For Dailymail.Com
title: Lindsay Lohan supports model brother Dakota Lohan at NYFW | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Snazzy dresser: Lindsay wore an off-the-shoulder faded black jumpsuit with bootcut legs for the fashionable outing A fuzzy emerald-green coat served both to glam up the demure 'fit and to protect the actress from the freezing New York cold. She clutched onto the same Gucci Bengal top handle bag ($1,850) that she had accessorized with earlier on Monday at ABC Studios for her appearance on The View. Linday's signature red tresses were styled in loose waves and pulled back into a low pony with face-framing pieces let out in the front. Natural look: Linday's signature red tresses were styled in loose waves and pulled back into a low pony with face-framing pieces let out in the front Hair friends: After the show, Lohan and designer Nicole Miller posed for a photo with big smiles, which Miller shared on Instagram The Mean Girls starlet's makeup was light and fresh, with dark lashes emphasizing her famous gray-green eyes. After the show, Lohan and designer Nicole Miller posed for a photo with big smiles, which Miller shared on Instagram with the caption: 'Redheads bonding at the after party.' Lindsay also snuggled up to her hunky bro, who still had his model face on as the brother-sister duo posed for a selfie. In another photo, Cody poses with designer Zapata, who in 2014 was falsely accused of being the married lover of Lindsay. All in the family: In another photo, Cody poses with designer Zapata, who in 2014 was falsley accused of being the married lover of Lindsay A year ago, Lindsay took to Instagram to hint that her 20-year-old brother may be entering the modeling world when she posted a sepia photo of the young stud with the caption: 'Yep! That's my brother, soon My mommy will bring him to @imgmodels like she did with me at @fordmodels.' Cody, who now goes by his full name Dakota Wyatt Lohan, is now officially signed by IMG Models - the same agency that represents Bella and Gigi Hadid and other A-list catwalkers.
